import React from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import classes from './PlaylistSection.module.css' import VideoCard from "../VideoCard/VideoCard"; class PlaylistSection extends React.Component { state = { response : [], element : '' } handleClick(event) { this.setState(element = event.target); return this.state.element } componentDidMount() { axios.get('https://5d76bf96515d1a0014085cf9.mockapi.io/playlist') .then((response) => { this.setState({ response : response.data }) }) } render() { return(
{this.state.response.map((data) => { return this.handleClick} key={data.id} thumbnail={data.thumbnail} title={data.title}/> })}
) } } export default PlaylistSection
